metadata.name: Istanbul Stories: Through the Window #1
metadata.description:
Istanbul Stories: Through the Window #1  
I was returning home on a ferry in Istanbul. He was looking at me like he sees my soul. We connected somehow.  
16/01/2016

Photographer: Masis Usenmez 

Bio: EFIAP honored, award-winning Armenian origin Turkish street and documentary photographer based in France.

Edition: 1/1

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, social media posts, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. It provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
